1. Show your passport at the nearest betting shop to receive a card.

2. Use the card to complete the verification process in your account.
Verification with Fonbet ID card details

1. Show your passport at any MEGAFON or CONTACT store and say you want to get fully registered for a QIWI Wallet.

2. Give your phone number and follow the instructions texted to you within 30 minutes by QIWI Wallet.

3. Finish verification using your QIWI credentials in your account at fon.bet.

Are you sure you want to abort the remote identification process? After cancellation, you will be able to restart the process.

Complete verification of your QIWI Wallet to make deposits and place bets

Check your incoming text messages from QIWI

Follow the instruction sent to your phone number and send a text message.

If you never received a text message from QIWI

1. Go to qiwi.com

2. Enter the phone number linked to your account

3. Click \"Create wallet\" and confirm your phone number by entering the code from the text message

4. Click Settings and go to the Confirm Verification section

5. Complete verification by entering the last 4 digits of your passport number.

"Complete the identification verification of your QIWI Wallet to make deposits and place bets
## Check for incoming SMS messages from QIWI
Follow the instructions where you will be asked to send a response message to the short number with the text “idXXXX”, where XXXX is the last four digits of your passport number. At the end of the confirmation procedure, you will receive an SMS containing the text \"Your identity has been confirmed.\"
## If you have not received an SMS from QIWI
1. Go to [qiwi.com](https://qiwi.com/) 2. Enter the phone number that you specified during registration 3. Click “Create Wallet” and confirm your phone number by entering the code received via SMS 4. Click “Settings” and go to “Confirm Identification” 5. Complete the identification verification process by entering the last four digits of your passport number. Follow the instructions where you will be asked to send a response message to the short number with the text “idXXXX”, where XXXX is the last four digits of your passport number. At the end of the confirmation procedure, you will receive an SMS with the text “Your identity has been verified.”"
If the confirmation request is not available in the \"Confirm ID\" section, please wait 30 minutes and then try again

1. Upload a picture of your passport 2. Choose a convenient way of video identification and the date and time when you are available to receive a call 3. Wait for the incoming video call from the Fonbet operator and complete the remote identification process

Get your passport ready to show to the operator. Make sure your %s is available to accept incoming video calls. Grant the application access to the microphone and camera in device settings. Do not turn off the microphone and camera until the end of your conversation with the Fonbet operator. In the event of any problems with your Internet or network connection, try to fix any problems and then wait for the video call to be repeated.
An incoming video call via %1$s to %2$s from Fonbet operator on %3$s from %4$s to %5$s.
An incoming video call will arrive in %1$s at %2$s from the Fonbet operator soon.

"It's easy to get your own Fonbet card: 1. 1. Visit your nearest Fonbet betting shop. 2. Show your passport to receive your personal Fonbet ID card."
Verification with Fonbet ID card details
I have a QIWI Wallet that has been verified

To open a QIWI Wallet with verified personal data: 1. Visit any MEGAFON or CONTACT shop with a Russian or foreign passport. 2. Inform the staff that you wish to go through the full identification process for QIWI and present your identification document. 3. Inform the staff of your phone number on which you wish to register your QIWI Wallet The cost of verification in MEGAFON - 200 ₽. The cost of verification in CONTACT - 150 ₽ 4. Wait for an SMS message from QIWI and follow the instructions given. The SMS will arrive within 30 minutes
According to your QIWI account data
I am a Russian citizen and want to verify my identity remotely
Website registration is available to Fonbet club and QIWI Wallet customers who have had their identity verified.

We will send a text message with a code and a verification email to the phone number and email address you provide. The phone number should match the number provided when registering your QIWI wallet.

"Your documents have been submitted for review. In a few minutes, you'll receive a text message with the results. You can also wait for your results without closing this window. After your documents are confirmed, you'll receive a text message with instructions from QIWI."
Congratulations! You are now registered with Fonbet! Your QIWI identification is not complete yet. You will receive a text message from QIWI within 30 minutes. Please follow its instructions.
